item.title: 文件显示，白宫将公布将美国人工智能推向海外的计划，打击美国的人工智能规则
item.description: 路透社看到的一份文件显示，白宫周三打算公布一项计划，要求向国外出口美国的人工智能技术，并打击被认为对美国人工智能发展限制过多的州法律。【原文：The White House on Wednesday intends to publish a plan that calls for the export of American AI technology abroad and a crackdown on state laws deemed too restrictive to let American AI flourish, a document seen by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 微软知道 SharePoint 服务器存在漏洞，但未能有效修补
item.description: 微软上个月发布的一个安全补丁未能完全修复美国科技巨头 SharePoint 服务器软件中的一个关键漏洞，而该漏洞早在 5 月份就已被发现，这为一场席卷全球的网络间谍行动打开了方便之门。【原文：A security patch released by Microsoft last month failed to fully fix a critical flaw in U.S. tech giant's SharePoint server software that had been identified in May, opening the door to a sweeping global cyber espionage operation.】

item.title: 欧盟监管机构警告称，环球公司 7.75 亿美元的市中心交易可能会阻碍竞争
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周二警告说，环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）旗下维珍音乐集团（Virgin Music Group）斥资 7.75 亿美元收购下城音乐公司（Downtown Music）可能会阻碍竞争，并使一个重要的竞争对手消失。【原文：Universal Music Group unit Virgin Music Group's $775 million acquisition of Downtown Music may hinder competition and remove an important competitor, EU antitrust regulators warned on Tuesday.】

item.title: 散户投资者扎堆，科尔股价翻番
item.description: 周二，美国连锁百货公司科尔（Kohl's）的股价大涨超过 100%，成为零售交易平台上交易量最大的股票之一。【原文：Shares of U.S. department store chain Kohl's jumped more than 100% on Tuesday, making it one of the most traded stocks on retail trading platforms.】

item.title: 广告公司 Interpublic 季度业绩超出预期，原因是客户支出恢复性增长
item.description: 本周二，广告集团 Interpublic 的第二季度收入和利润超过了分析师的预期，这主要得益于客户营销支出的恢复性增长，使其股价在收盘前上涨了 3%。【原文：Ad group Interpublic surpassed analysts' estimates for second-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, thanks to resilient marketing spend from clients, sending its shares up 3% before the bell.】

item.title: 联合国负责人敦促科技界利用可再生能源为数据中心供电
item.description: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥-古特雷斯（António Guterres）周二呼吁科技公司到2030年在数据中心的建设中100%使用可再生能源，即使该行业转向天然气和燃煤电厂以满足激增的需求。【原文：U.N. Secretary General António Guterres on Tuesday called on tech companies to power the build out of data centers with 100% renewable energy by 2030, even as the industry turns to gas and coal-fired power plants to meet surging demand.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告关税不是解决全球失衡的办法
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二表示，全球经常账户余额在2024年急剧扩大，扭转了自2008-2009年全球金融危机以来的收窄趋势，并警告说关税不是解决问题的办法。【原文：Global current account balances widened sharply in 2024, reversing a narrowing under way since the global financial crisis of 2008-2009, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday, warning that tariffs were not the answer.】

item.title: 欧洲第二季度企业利润预计下降 0.3
item.description: 本周二，最新的盈利预测显示，尽管全球贸易仍存在不确定性，欧盟也在准备对美国的任何重大关税采取反制措施，但欧洲企业的健康前景略有改善。【原文：The outlook for European corporate health has slightly improved, the latest earnings forecasts showed on Tuesday, despite continued uncertainty over global trade and the European Union preparing for counter-measures against any major U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: Stellantis 将于今年在南非首次推出 Leapmotor 电动汽车
item.description: Stellantis 公司周二表示，计划从 9 月份开始在南非销售由其合作伙伴 Leapmotor 开发的中国品牌电动汽车 C10。【原文：Stellantis plans to sell Chinese-branded electric vehicles developed by its partner Leapmotor in South Africa starting with the C10 from September, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 菲利普-莫里斯公司因卷烟销量下降而收入不及预期
item.description: 由于香烟销量下滑，生产万宝路香烟的菲利普莫里斯国际公司（PMI）周二公布的第二季度营收低于分析师预期。【原文：Philip Morris International (PMI) , which makes Marlboro cigarettes, reported second-quarter revenue on Tuesday that fell short of analysts' estimates as cigarette sales volumes slipped.】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，油漆制造商 Sherwin-Williams 下调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 受涂料产品需求疲软的影响，谢尔温-威廉姆斯（Sherwin-Williams）周二下调了全年调整后利润预期，第二季度盈利未达预期，导致该公司股价在盘前交易中下跌超过 4%。【原文：Sherwin-Williams cut full-year adjusted profit forecast and missed second-quarter earnings estimate on Tuesday, hit by soft demand for paint products, sending the company's shares down more than 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 中国市场监管部门暂停对杜邦中国的反垄断调查
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周二发表声明称，已暂停对美国杜邦公司的子公司杜邦中国集团（DuPont China Group）的反垄断调查。【原文：China's market regulator said in a statement on Tuesday that it had suspended the antitrust investigation into DuPont China Group, a subsidiary of the U.S. firm DuPont .】

item.title: 美国财政部长美联储鲍威尔现在无需下台
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）没有必要立即下台。【原文：There is no need for U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to immediately step down, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday, adding that the Fed chief's legacy should be to right-size the central bank's non-monetary policy functions.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼美联储在货币政策方面的独立性非常重要-CNBC
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周二表示，央行不受政治干扰地制定货币政策的能力 "非常重要"。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman on Tuesday said the central bank's ability to set monetary policy without political interference is "very important."】

item.title: Equifax 季度利润超出预期，上调年度收入预期
item.description: 周二，征信机构 Equifax 的第二季度利润超出了市场预期，这主要得益于抵押贷款信用报告查询量的降幅小于预期，Equifax 还小幅上调了全年营收预期。【原文：Credit bureau Equifax beat Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by a smaller-than-expected drop in inquiries for mortgage credit reports, and raised its annual revenue forecast marginally.】

item.title: 贝森特表示将会见中国官员，讨论延长关税期限事宜
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，他将于下周与中国财政部长会面，讨论可能延长8月12日提高关税最后期限的事宜。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday that he will meet his Chinese counterpart next week and discuss what is likely to be an extension of an August 12 deadline for higher tariffs.】

item.title: MSCI 公布第二季度利润增长，原因是指数产品需求强劲
item.description: 指数提供商摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二公布第二季度利润增长，原因是客户支出的增加推动了对其指数产品和分析服务的需求。【原文：Index provider MSCI reported a rise in second-quarter profit on Tuesday, as improved spending by clients drove up demand for its index products and analytics services.】

item.title: 苹果供应商 Goertek 将以 13 亿美元收购联丰商业旗下部门
item.description: 苹果供应商 Goertek Inc 周二表示，计划以约 104 亿港元（13.2 亿美元）的总价收购香港联丰商业控股旗下的两家公司。【原文：Apple supplier Goertek Inc said on Tuesday it plans to buy two units of Hong Kong's Luen Fung Commercial Holdings for about combined HK$10.4 billion ($1.32 billion).】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司第二季度利润因 16 亿美元的费用支出而大幅下滑
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周二报告称，该公司第二季度利润骤降约 80%，此前这家美国国防巨头录得税前亏损 16 亿美元，主要与该公司航空部门的一个机密项目有关。【原文：Lockheed Martin reported on Tuesday that its second-quarter profit plunged by about 80%, after the U.S. defense giant recorded pre-tax losses of $1.6 billion, mainly linked to a classified program within its Aeronautics segment.】

item.title: 法官称马里法院驳回释放四名巴里克员工的上诉
item.description: 法官桑巴-萨尔（Samba Sarr）说，马里一家法院周二驳回了巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining）要求释放去年 11 月被捕的四名员工的上诉，这是这家加拿大公司与马里政府就该国采矿业务的税收和所有权问题长期对峙的最新进展。【原文：A court in Mali on Tuesday rejected an appeal by Barrick Mining to release four employees arrested last November, judge Samba Sarr said, the latest development in a long-running standoff between the Canadian firm and the Mali government over taxes and ownership of mining operations in the country.】

item.title: 巴西 Totvs 公司同意收购 StoneCo 公司的 Linx 部门
item.description: 巴西软件公司 Totvs 周二表示，已同意收购 StoneCo 的 Linx 部门，交易价值 30.5 亿雷亚尔（约合 5.4790 亿美元）。【原文：Brazilian software company Totvs has agreed to buy StoneCo's Linx unit in a deal worth 3.05 billion reais ($547.90 million), it said on Tuesday, adding that it expects the move to strengthen its position in the retail segment.】

item.title: 印度阿卡萨航空公司认为未来几年波音交付量将增加
item.description: 印度阿卡萨航空公司（Akasa Air）首席财务官安库尔-戈尔（Ankur Goel）周二表示，预计未来几年波音公司的飞机交付量将有所增长，到2032年将实现机队规模从目前的30架增至226架的目标。【原文：India's Akasa Air expects a pick up in plane deliveries from Boeing over the coming years and to reach its target for a fleet of 226 aircraft by 2032, up from 30 currently, chief financial officer Ankur Goel said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Pultegroup 因销售激励措施得力，季度收入超出预期
item.description: 住宅建筑商普尔特集团（Pultegroup）周二公布的第二季度营收高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于购房者优惠政策带来的稳定的房屋销售，使该公司股价在收盘前上涨了 1.7%。【原文：Homebuilder Pultegroup on Tuesday posted second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates, helped by steady home sales resulting from buyer incentives, sending the company's shares up 1.7% before the bell.】

item.title: 特斯拉从监管减免中获得的宽裕资金将在销售疲软中枯竭
item.description: 随着美国政府对一项名为 "监管信用额度 "的环境资产政策的改变，特斯拉利润的一个关键驱动因素正在迅速消失。【原文：A key driver of Tesla's profit is disappearing fast as the U.S. government changes policies on an environmental asset known as regulatory credits.】

item.title: 由于关税成本的影响，RTX 下调了 2025 年的利润预期
item.description: RTX 周二下调了 2025 年的利润预期，原因是这家航空航天和国防巨头受到了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易战的打击，尽管市场对其发动机和售后服务的需求强劲。【原文：RTX cut its 2025 profit forecast on Tuesday, as the aerospace and defense giant took a hit from U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war despite strong demand for its engines and aftermarket services.】

item.title: 可口可乐因汽水需求稳定超出预期，计划推出蔗糖产品
item.description: 可口可乐公司周二公布的第二季度营收和利润均超出华尔街预期，原因是这家饮料巨头受益于零糖饮料需求的回升和苏打水价格的上涨。【原文：Coca-Cola beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, as the beverages giant benefited from resilient demand for zero-sugar drinks and higher prices for its sodas.】

item.title: 美元跳水，美国跨国公司获得意外之财
item.description: 在这个财报季，美元暴跌拯救了一些美国大型跨国公司，缓解了唐纳德-特朗普总统关税造成的成本上升和财务规划混乱。【原文：A slump in the dollar has come to the rescue of some major multinational U.S. companies this earnings season, easing the sting from President Donald Trump's tariffs that have driven up costs and upended financial planning.】

item.title: 武器需求强劲，诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司上调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）周二上调了年度利润预期，押注在地缘政治紧张局势加剧之际对其军用飞机和防御系统的持续需求。【原文：Northrop Grumman raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, betting on sustained demand for its military aircraft and defense systems as geopolitical tensions simmer.】

item.title: 由于北美钻井需求疲软，哈里伯顿季度利润下降
item.description: 油田服务公司哈里伯顿周二报告，受北美需求疲软的影响，第二季度利润下降。【原文：Oilfield services firm Halliburton reported a fall in profit for the second quarter on Tuesday, hurt by weak North America demand.】

item.title: D.R.霍顿第三季度业绩高于预期，得益于激励机制的推动
item.description: 本周二，D.R. Horton 公布的第三季度利润和收入均高于预期，原因是在高利率和成本上升的情况下，购房者激励措施支撑了房屋销售，使得该房屋建筑商的股价在收盘前上涨了 5.7%。【原文：D.R. Horton reported third-quarter profit and revenue above estimates on Tuesday as buyer incentives sustained home sales amid high interest rates and rising costs, sending shares of the homebuilder up 5.7% before the bell.】
